summary: THE SERVICE POWER ASSIST AND SERVICE ADVANCE TRAC WARNINGS COME ON WHILE DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY. NO PROBLEM IF CONTINUE DRIVING, HOWEVER IF TURN OFF POWER IT BECOME IMPOSSIBLE TO STEER WHEN TURNED BACK ON. THE BLINKERS WILL ALSO NOT WORK WHEN THIS ERROR HAPPENS. BOUGHT BRAND NEW RACK AND PINION FROM FORD DEALERSHIP DID NOT FIXED THE PROBLEM.
